snippet: After Alex Rodriguez met with investigators about Biogenesis on Friday, he declined to show up for a game that ended up being rained out in Tampa, Fla., two baseball officials said.
abstract: New York Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez, after meeting with Major League Baseball investigators to discuss his alleged involvement with a clinic that dispensed performance-enhancing drugs, does not show up for scheduled rehabilitation game in minors.

byline.original: By DAVID WALDSTEIN and PETER KERASOTIS
byline.contributor: Peter Kerasotis contributed reporting from Tampa, Fla.

lead_paragraph: After Alex Rodriguez met with investigators about Biogenesis on Friday, he declined to show up for a game that ended up being rained out in Tampa, Fla., two baseball officials said.

headline.main: Rodriguez Is Said to Be a No-Show After Meeting With Investigators
headline.print_headline: Present for Investigators And Missing for a Game
